author: ajith
msg: 1. Added a NullablePullParser.java that can handle the null values at the element level.
2. Updated the ADBBeanTemplate.xsl and the related classes to support a add method to the any array type. This needs to be extended to other types as well.
3. Fixed some minor bugs in the SchemaCompiler.java
